    • Method Detail

      • withRsql

        @NotNull
public static <P extends StatePersistable,F extends Fields<P>,C extends VaultQueryCriteriaCondition<P,? extends F>> C withRsql(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                        C $receiver,
                                                                                                                                        @Nullable
                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String rsql,
                                                                                                                                        @NotNull
                                                                                                                                        RsqlArgumentsConverterFactory<P,F> converterFactory)

        class VaultQueryCriteriaCondition extension that adds the given RSQL filter to the current instance, then returns it for chaining.

        Example:

        bookQuery{
   status = Vault.StateStatus.ALL
   // ...
   orderBy {
       fields.title sort DESC
   }
}
// Add the RSQL query filter
.withRsql("authorFirst==john;authorLast==doe")
// Convert all the above
// to Corda QueryCriteria
.toCriteria()

        See Also:
        class VaultQueryCriteriaCondition

      • anyToBoolean

        public static boolean anyToBoolean(@Nullable
                                   java.lang.Object $receiver)

        Converts input to a String (if not null), then to a boolean (optimised for performance).

        The values "true", "t", "yes", "y", "on" and "1" (case insensitive) will return true. Otherwise, false is returned.
